Articles.Content: So i was wondering, when will making history come out for console? Also is it going to come out for console?

Well, the truth is that the console version has more or less been abandoned. We've had basically no news in like 6 months, and many people have given up on it, seeing it as dead, but we can't be sure. It's unlikely that MH will come to console, but there's still a possibility.

If you consider the game support (after 2,5years sice original release date we are still waiting for the version without gamebreaking bugs), I would not expect the future content to be added.

Supposedly they are still working on the update (but there is no info except that we will have a info "soon"). So I expect somewhen in the future we will get one last final patch and then the game will be abandonned :-(

Please dont just abandon the console version, I love the game and would be extremely upset that we can't play the game to its full extent. If anything just make a few mods accessible to the console so many people can enjoy the game much more!
